bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks--Amendment 08: Two-Port Media Access Control (MAC) Relay
IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks--Amendment 08: Two-Port Media Access Control (MAC) Relay
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.1aj/D2.2, Oct 2007

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q defines the architecture, procedures and protocols associated with relay devices that are able to interconnect two LANs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
